Text: One more exquisite compilation from your more than remarkable collection. Your posts are always more than welcome. They boost my mood taking me back to some happier times. Thnx.
rtrifunov, thx for the comment. It's good to see my old downloaders are still around!
thx 80zforever - always a treat seeing these collections!!1   u rock!!!
You're welcome, 80z. There will be downloaders, as long as you're willing to share your unbelievable collection. We'll seed as much as we can. Cheers

Maybe the best batch of "Rare Hits" ever... and I'm seeding all 46 of 'em! Especially love "The Other Ones" and "Major Thinkers". I grabbed The Other Ones album from you awhile back but would love to see the Major Thinkers album on one of your future compilations. Thanks again for all the great memories and NEW old music!

I gotta say, I am having a blast listening to all these songs again. Thanks for sharing. I was wondering if you have Tommy Tutone. The only song I can find is Jenny, but I remember that there were a lot of good songs on that album. 

Thanks ,
misrpint
